mapper.select: SELECT qna_no, member_id, member_nickname, qna_category, qna_title, qna_secret, create_date, update_date FROM qna ORDER BY update_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT q.qna_no, q.member_id, q.member_nickname, q.qna_category, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_secret, q.create_date, q.update_date, an.admin_id, an.answer_content FROM qna q LEFT JOIN qna_answer an ON q.qna_no = an.qna_no WHERE q.qna_no = #{qnaNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna( member_id, member_nickname, qna_category, qna_title, qna_content, qna_secret, update_date, create_date ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberNickname}, #{qnaCategory}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaSecret}, NOW(), NOW() )
INSERT INTO qna_image( qna_no, qna_image_name, qna_image_ext, qna_image_size ) VALUES ( #{qnaNo}, #{qnaImgName}, #{qnaImgExt}, #{qnaImgSize} )
INSERT INTO qna_answer( qna_no, admin_id, answer_content, create_date ) VALUES ( #{qnaNo}, #{adminId}, #{answerContent}, NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT q.qna_no, q.member_nickname, q.qna_category, q.qna_title, q.qna_secret, q.create_date, q.update_date, i.qna_image_no, i.qna_image_name, i.qna_image_ext FROM qna q LEFT JOIN qna_image i ON q.qna_no = i.qna_no WHERE q.qna_secret = '공개글' AND
qna_category = #{qnaCategory}
AND
(q.qna_title LIKE '%{searchWord}%' OR q.member_nickname LIKE '%{searchWord}%')
ORDER BY q.update_date DESC
